title: Oaty Pumpkin Chiffon Pie
ingredients: ['110g quick oats', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '75g unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon powdered gelatine', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground mace', '5 egg yolks, beaten', '175ml milk', '250g pumpkin puree', '3 egg whites', '1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar', '65g caster sugar']
